PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-01452019-02-28ISED,  ,  ,  , 
ActDepartment of Industry Act
SubjectCouncil of Science and Innovation ** Advisory Committee **
PrecisOrder (1) Repealing Order in Council P.C. 2007-1834 of December 3, 2007; and (2) Approving the establishment of an Advisory Committee to be known as the COUNCIL ON SCIENCE AND INNOVATION in order to provide independent, expert policy advice in support of the Government of Canada's efforts to strengthen the science and research ecosystem and stimulate innovation across the economy.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
